titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for transplantation of the Greames.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Contains illustrated woodcut initial showing a man battling a three-headed beast.
"Giuen at Wilton, the fourth day of December, in the first yeere of our Reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the seuen and thirtieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
